page.title: 04SHOPPING IN RHYL PRECINCT
page.content: The majority of shoppers interviewed were pleased with the precinct and only 8% disliked it. Most liked the convenience of shopping under one roof and praised the warmth, cleanliness and easy parking. 50% shopped more in Rhyl since it had opened. 26% who used to shop in Chester and Prestatyn now shopped more regularly in Rhyl. 70% thought it was too small and many felt it needed a cafe, toilets, supermarket or large store. Others wanted more plants, music, more floors and one person even wanted a baby-minding service. Most people thought car parking charges were very reasonable but one person said they should be free. Most were local people who welcomed the precinct but worried about the large number of vacant shops in nearby streets as traders moved into it.
